thread.title: Man charged for indecent exposure assaults official while trying to escape

title: Man charged for indecent exposure assaults official while trying to escape
text:
Published By: Pittsburgh Post: Local - Today 
A man being held at the Allegheny County Jail on indecent exposure charges is accused of assaulting a sheriff's deputy in an escape attempt ...
